sql.value: select sys_staff.source, sys_staff.staffName, ifnull(partnerAccountInfo.partnerCount,0) as partnerCount , ifnull(orderInfos.orderCount,0) as orderCount, ifnull(orderInfos.orderAmount,0) as orderAmount from (select source,staffName,staffPhone from sys_staff where sourceType = 2)sys_staff left join ( select agentPhone,count(id) as partnerCount from ( select id,partnerName,mobilePhone,referralName,referralPhone,agentName,agentPhone,state from partner_account where state = 1 and { registerTime >= CONCAT( #createdatestart#,' 00:00:00' )} and { registerTime <= CONCAT( #createdateend#,' 23:59:59' )} )partner_account group by agentPhone )partnerAccountInfo on sys_staff.staffPhone = partnerAccountInfo.agentPhone left join ( select orderInfo.agentPhone, count(orderInfo.id) orderCount, sum(orderInfo.salesAmount) as orderAmount from ( select owner_order.id, owner_order.partnerId, owner_order.isSettle, owner_quotation.salesAmount, partner_account.referralName, partner_account.referralPhone, partner_account.agentName, partner_account.agentPhone from (select * from owner_order where partnerId is not null and isSettle = 1 and {#condition#})owner_order inner join owner_quotation on owner_order.designId = owner_quotation.designId inner join partner_account on owner_order.partnerId = partner_account.id and partner_account.state = 1 )orderInfo group by orderInfo.agentPhone )orderInfos on sys_staff.staffPhone = orderInfos.agentPhone
